page.title: 15CULDUTHEL HOSPITAL
page.content: {CULDUTHEL HOSPITAL}was once the private home of the Frasers of Culduthel but has been used as a hospital since 1930 Originally it was a T.B. sanatorium, but advances in the treatment of T.B. made it obsolete. Its situation and number of individual rooms made it ideal for the treatment of chest illnesses, infectious diseases and geriatrics. It is small and beautifully situated in the centre of a wood. There are only 40 beds at present but 10 more will be available when renovations are complete. Patients, who come from all over the{HIGHLANDS {AND ISLANDS}enjoy walks in the woods. Unfortunately Culduthel will close within the next few years as a new multi_storey hospital at{RAIGMORE} where staff and patients will be transferred.
